overview: Before she can be beaten up by the other prisoners, Shyla is rescued by Officer Sins. Everything has a price in prison, and her ass now belongs to him. Referee Ricki just made a bad call that cost Danny's team the championship. He tracks her down in the locker room and takes out his anger on her ass! Two pornstars, two big butts, only one can win the cash. The challenge includes spanking, ass to ass dildo, ass reaming and more. Let's see whose anus is the fittest!
title: Big Butts Like It Big 6
